title: Chicken pakora
ingredients: ['450g cubed chicken', '1/2 small cabbage, finely chopped', '2 carrots, grated', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon tandoori masala powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 handful chopped fresh coriander', '5 tablespoons gram flour (chickpea or besan flour)', 'vegetable oil']
